name: Baki's Quest
description:
- The main character tries to help a depressed person by finding the items which were stolen by a witch. 

- The characters in my game are: Roger (Main Character), Baki (Servant), Bill (Master). and a Witch.

- In my game, i have got various objects which leads to solving the puzzle. Moreover, I have added a bunch of dialogues when my character looks at or interact with objects or characters.
